question.title: All People Report to the Given Manager
question.translatedTitle: 向公司CEO汇报工作的所有人
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists Employees (employee_id int, employee_name varchar(30), manager_id int)
insert into Employees (employee_id, employee_name, manager_id) values ('1', 'Boss', '1')
